oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Country Music Hall of Fame Medallion Ceremony - Jim Foglesong and Kris Kristofferson -- 2005-05-01 -- Tape 1 of 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Country Music Hall of Fame medallion ceremony held on May 1, 2005 from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum. Inductees honored were Jim Foglesong and Kris Kristofferson. Tape labeled as #1.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Kyle Young; Vince Gill; E.W. "Bud" Wendell; The Oak Ridge Boys; Mark Miller; John Hobbs; T. Graham Brown; Garth Brooks; Jo Walker-Meador; Jim Foglelsong; Ray Price; John Prine; Cowboy Jack Clement;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Recording begins in progress / (01:38) Opening comments by Kyle Young / (02:24) Introduction of the All-Star Band and Vince Gill / (03:14) Give Me Jesus (Vince Gill) / (06:52) Kyle Young continues with ceremony introductory comments including introduction of all attending VIP's and an acknowledgement or last year's losses / (16:20) Introduction of Bud Wendell / (17:00) Comments from Bud Wendell / (21:15) Kyle Young introduces the leader of the Medallion all-star band, John Hobbs / (22:20) Kyle begins the Jim Foglesong segment / (23:45) Introduction of the Oak Ridge Boys with comments and performance of the song Y'all Come Back Saloon / (29:15) Kyle Young continues with Jim Foglesong segment / (30:00) Introduction of Mark Miller with comments and performance of Betty's Bein' Bad / (34:21) Kyle continues with the Foglesong segment / (34:50) John Hobbs introduces the All-Star band / (35:44) Kyle continues with the Foglesong segment /

(36:15) introduction of T. Graham Brown with comments and performance of Hell And High Water / (41:22) Kyle Young continues with the Foglesong segment / (42:00) Introduction of Garth Brooks with comments and performance of If Tomorrow Never Comes / (49:10) Kyle continues with the Foglesong segment with family introductions / (50:00) Introduction of Jo Walker-Meador with comments and presentation of medallion to Jim Foglesong / (55:39) Jim Foglesong acceptance comments / (01:02:12) Audio from video presentation as Kyle begins the Kris Kristofferson segment / (01:04:45) Introduction of Ray Price and the Cherokee Cowboys with performance of For The Good Times / (01:09:36) Kyle continues with the Kris Kristofferson segment / (01:10:22) Introduction of John Prine with performance of Sunday Morning, Coming Down with spoken thanks to Kris / (01:16:44) Kyle continues with the Kristofferson segment with acknowledgement of family in attendance /
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Young, Kyle; Gill, Vince; Wendell, E. W.; The Oak Ridge Boys (Musical group); Miller, Mark; Hobbs, John; Brown, T. Graham; Brooks, Garth; Walker-Meador, Jo; Foglesong, Jim; Price, Ray; Prine, John; Clement, Jack;
